Image.Alt: A patch with a light blue background and a dark blue phoenix with a thunder bold in the center of its chest. It says "Twin Rivers Council Rotary Scout Reservation 2004."
Image.Caption: The patch scouts and adults earned by camping at Rotary in 2004.

Image.Alt: 5 scouts sit around a picnic table. Four are facing to the right, one is facing to the left.
Image.Caption: First year scouts sit at a picnic table.

Image.Alt: A scout is looking at a bulletin board that is hanging on a tree.
A scout is holding an ave over his head, looking at a log on the ground that is standing up vertically.
Image.Caption: Chopping wood!

Image.Alt: A scout wearing a red Troop 53 class B tee-shirt and wearing a baithing suit looking at the camera.
A man sitting in a camping chair in the sunlight. Behind are two cabin tents.
Image.Caption: Scoutmaster, Don McKnight, soaking up the sun.

Image.Alt: Four people are staring at a fire pit. Two of them are holding chickens over the fire pit.
Image.Caption: Scouts and adults trying to cook dinner, which is BBQ chicken.

Image.Alt: Two people walking towards the camera talking to each other. The person on the right is wet, and wrapped in a towel.
Three people smiling at the camera. The two at the ends are wearing class A uniforms.
Scoutmaster McKnight talking to Seth Hendrick, who is wearing a colorful felt parrot hat.
Image.Caption: Scout, Seth Hendrick, wearing a parrot hat to go with the camp's pirate theme for the year.

Image.Alt: Two scouts in class A uniforms talking to each other, smiling. Surrounding htem are 5 other people.
Image.Caption: Scouts visiting their families.

Image.Alt: Two people standing on the camera. The scout on the right is holding the Michael Dikant Award.
Image.Caption: Dustin Albertine (right) receiving the Michael Dikant Annual Honor Scout Award. To the left is Bill Dikant.

Image.Alt: Two adults stand on either side of a scout, who is bent over sawing a log with a bow saw.
Image.Caption: Adult leaders supervise cutting wood for the fire.

Image.Alt: Three scouts smile for the camera.
Image.Caption: Scouts prepare to leave the campsite overnight to fulfil a Camping merit badge requirement.

Image.Alt: There are three scouts holding a stretched out bow, ready to shoot.
Image.Caption: Scouts shooting archery.

Image.Alt: Two scouts at the archery range. Both are smiling, and facing right.
Two scouts are sitting at a picnic table. The one on the right is looking at a compass.
Two scouts weaving baskets. The one in the middle is wearing a blue hat, the one on the right is wearing the red troop hat. There's a scout on the left writing something on a clipboard.
Image.Caption: Scouts weave stools for the Basketry merit badge.

Image.Alt: Three scouts are running towards something, while two scouts off to the right watch.
Image.Caption: First year scouts playing in a field.

Image.Alt: Three canoes are in thie picture, each of which have two people with life jackets on.
Two people in a canoe that has been swamped. The canoe is just under the water surface.
Image.Caption: Scoutmaster McKnight taking on water.

Image.Alt: 27 people in class A uniforms smiling for the camera in front of an American flag pole. To the left is a scout holding the US flag, to the right is another scout holding the Troop flag.
Image.Caption: Troop photo at Rotary Scout Reservation in 2004.
